name: Lazy Cupid
description:
Today is another work day for the cupid. But you are too lazy to descend and shoot arrows on things to get then into love. The air is polluted, dense and you can't see a reason to go down there. So, let's shoot at anything below randomly and see what do we get!

- Use WASD or Arrows to move
- Use SPACEBAR or Left Click to shoot

Game made for Brackeys Game Jam #2 by Leonardo 'Layzyn' da Luz on the theme "Love is Blind!"
